serviceDescription: VCP LCM uses ICMP (ping) to verify if the Chargeback VM is deployed successfully
VCP LCM uses ICMP (ping) to verify if the Usage Meter VM is deployed successfully
VCP LCM uses ICMP (ping) to verify if the RMQ VMs are deployed successfully
vCenter API is used to deploy VMs and to retrieve information about VMs or other VC entities.
purpose: Outbound communication with vCenter to deploy VMs or retrieve configuration values

destination: vCenter Server (hosting VCP LCM managed products)
serviceDescription: Commands are executed on VMs via vmtools through vCenter
purpose: Outbound communication with VMs via VMtools

serviceDescription: Some files are transferred to VMs using vmtools, which requires communication between VCP LCM and the ESXi server
purpose: File transfer to VMs via vmtools

serviceDescription: Access to VCP LCM API
Access to VCP LCM User Interface
VCP LCM validates access to Aria Operations
VCP LCM validates access to a specified NSX-T instance and retrieves info about certain entities
VCP LCM runs some commands on the RabbitMQ VMs via SSH
VCP LCM validates AMQP access to RabbitMQ
VCP LCM runs some commands on the Chargeback appliance via SSH
purpose: SSH access to VMware Chargeback Appliance

serviceDescription: VCP LCM runs some commands on the UM appliance via SSH
purpose: SSH access to Usage Meter Appliance

serviceDescription: VCP LCM runs some commands on VCD cells via SSH
VCP LCM accesses VCD cells' management API to retrieve information about DB cluster
VCP LCM accesses Chargeback API to retrieve and set configuration
VCP LCM accesses UM API to retrieve and set configuration
VCP LCM accesses VCD API to retrieve and set configuration
VCP LCM uses ICMP (ping) to verify if cells are deployed successfully

If the user of VCP LCM agrees to VMware's CEIP, VCP LCM sends anonymous telemetry data regularly to VMware. If connectivity is not given, data cannot be sent. This does not have any effect on VCP LCM functionality.
VCP LCM checks regularly for new interop bundle updates. If connectivity is not given, the check cannot be performed. This does not have any effect on VCP LCM functionality.
